shortText: An `AddressSearcherOptions` stores a set of parameters
that will be sent to "searchAddresses" API.

comment.text: Example: `"東京都 AND 渋谷区"`
comment.shortText: The query to search against the address database.
The offset from which you want to retrieve the result.
The maximum number of items that you want to retrieve.

text: Defaults to the latest available version.
comment.shortText: The version of which the database is searched against.

shortText: The facet representation at which level the resulting facets
